name: Tiny Warlock [LD]
description:
ammo and health are the same so fight carefully! fight on small, procedurally generated  worlds while enemies clash around you. 

Use infinite lives to build your character, but you only have 3 when a boss is around.picking up power beyond your max health will raise your max health and boost your character. use this to your advantage for the boss fights!

made for LD39. version 1.1.3

Post-Jam Version in development: Planned Updates in Full Release:

  • More Enemies
  • Full open World, including Updated Generation
  • Questline
  • Updated particles and balance
  • Weapons and Items
  • Any suggestions are welcome.
